mapper.sql: id, title, summary, content, picture, channel_id, category_id, user_id, hits, hot, status, deleted, created, updated
mapper.select: SELECT cms_article.id as id, cms_article.title as title, cms_article.summary as summary, cms_article.content as content, cms_article.category_id as category_id, cms_article.picture as picture, cms_article.status as status, cms_article.hits as hits, cms_article.hot as hot, cms_article.created as created, cms_article.updated as updated, cms_category.id as cateid, cms_category.name as cat_name FROM cms_article JOIN cms_category ON cms_article.category_id=cms_category.id WHERE cms_article.user_id=#{userId} AND cms_article.deleted=1

SELECT cms_article.id as id, cms_article.title as title, cms_article.summary as summary, cms_article.content as content, cms_article.picture as picture, cms_article.status as status, cms_article.hits as hits, cms_article.hot as hot, cms_article.created as created, cms_article.updated as updated, cms_user.id as userid, cms_user.username as username FROM cms_article JOIN cms_user ON cms_article.user_id=cms_user.id WHERE cms_article.category_id=#{categoryId}

SELECT cms_article.id as id, cms_article.title as title, cms_article.summary as summary, cms_article.content as content, cms_article.picture as picture, cms_article.status as status, cms_article.hits as hits, cms_article.hot as hot, cms_article.created as created, cms_article.updated as updated, cms_user.id as userid, cms_user.username as username, cms_user.nickname as nickname FROM cms_article JOIN cms_user ON cms_article.user_id=cms_user.id WHERE cms_article.id=#{articleId}
